amongRoles.name: Super Hero
amongRoles.description: He NEEDS to win the game at all cost, he will have a huge penality if he doesn't. He needs the most kills, assists, and damage at the end of the game. He doesn't get a malus if other players spot his role.

amongRoles.name: Droid
amongRoles.description: He comes in two forms : Normal Droid and Damaged Droid. (1 out of 5 chance to be damaged). He also need to follow the instructions sent to him via private messages every 5 minutes. If he is damaged, the droid has 1/3 of a chance to have 2 instructions and 1/3 of a chance to have none.

amongRoles.name: Snake
amongRoles.description: He needs to win the game with the most death and damage of his team.

amongRoles.name: Double-Sided
amongRoles.description: He starts the game good or bad, then randomly changes. He needs to win or loose depending on his side.

amongRoles.name: Impostor
amongRoles.description: He needs to int the game without being noticed.

amongRoles.name: Scammer
amongRoles.description: He needs to win the game and to be voted as random other role. If more than a half vote him as his fake role, other players get a malus in points.

amongRoles.name: Devoted Protector
amongRoles.description: He needs to protect a random choosed player. If his player dies, he has 30s to die. If the player is an ennemy, he can't kill him. If the player is an ally, he can't take any kill if the player is fighting.
